message.entry: Select a ROS Point Cloud Topic

No topics are available from the ROS network (using ROS master at {0}). <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="suggestion" retvalue="false"> <cmd>openDialog(ros.slros.internal.dlg.NetworkAddressSpecifier);</cmd> <txt>Check the ROS network addresses configuration</txt> </action> </actions>
